name: ORPHEUS (moonofpluto)
description:
A Blaseball twine story.

The dead charged forth, the coin burned, the Hall is open.

There's a long journey home from Elsewhere. Son Jensen leads the charge.

ORPHEUS is a story about finding home amidst grief, being selfish in the face of inevitability, and holding tight to everyone you love. It totals 11k words.

Note: ORPHEUS is not mobile friendly. There is a section with intense flashing, tagged cw flashing. There is an alternative link just below with no flashing, if this is an issue for you please use the second link.

Content Warnings: body horror, dissociation, death, unreality, hallucinations.
